comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: 27 July 1944. The 362nd FG had been on the Continent less than a month (based at Lignerolles, France) when P-47D serial 42-75172 of the 379th Fighter Squadron suffered this indignity. It appears to have been a landing/taxi accident - the right aileron of the offending 'Jug' lies by the tail - as 172 was being armed, but no record of the other aircraft can be located at present.
